personaCards.title: Wheelchair User
personaCards.description: Uses public transit with a manual wheelchair.

personaCards.title: Visually Impaired Rider
personaCards.description: Relies on tactile signs and audible signals.

personaCards.title: Senior with Cane
personaCards.description: Prefers short walks and shaded stops.

personaCards.title: Autistic Teen
personaCards.description: Sensitive to noise and prefers predictable routes.

personaCards.title: Working Parent
personaCards.description: Travels with a stroller during rush hour.

personaCards.title: Amputee Veteran
personaCards.description: Navigates with a prosthetic leg and limited stairs.

personaCards.title: Teen Bicyclist
personaCards.description: Combines bike riding with transit.

personaCards.title: Low-Income Worker
personaCards.description: Works night shifts and depends on off-peak service.

personaCards.title: Pregnant Person
personaCards.description: Seeks comfortable seating and short walks.

personaCards.title: Hearing-Impaired Commuter
personaCards.description: Uses real-time signage for updates.

personaCards.title: Recent Immigrant
personaCards.description: Learning English and transit signage.

personaCards.title: College Student
personaCards.description: Travels late and with a limited budget.

personaCards.title: Freelancer
personaCards.description: Works remotely and travels irregularly.

personaCards.title: Refugee Family
personaCards.description: Multiple children, unfamiliar with city layout.

personaCards.title: Service Dog Handler
personaCards.description: Travels with a trained animal assistant.

personaCards.title: Caretaker
personaCards.description: Assisting an elder or disabled person.

personaCards.title: Person with PTSD
personaCards.description: Avoids crowded, chaotic environments.

personaCards.title: Rural Resident
personaCards.description: Limited access to public transportation.

personaCards.title: Gig Driver
personaCards.description: Occasionally takes transit to avoid parking.

personaCards.title: High School Student
personaCards.description: Relies on free student passes.

scenarioCards.title: Elevator Broken
scenarioCards.description: The elevator at your station is out of order.

scenarioCards.title: Bus Delay
scenarioCards.description: Your bus is delayed 25 minutes during peak hours.

scenarioCards.title: Friendly Driver
scenarioCards.description: The driver lowers the ramp and greets you kindly.

scenarioCards.title: Quiet Ride
scenarioCards.description: Peaceful, no unexpected sounds or interruptions.

scenarioCards.title: Weather Issue
scenarioCards.description: It’s pouring and there’s no shelter at the stop.

scenarioCards.title: Access Ramp Blocked
scenarioCards.description: Ramp area is obstructed by bikes.

scenarioCards.title: Inaccessible App
scenarioCards.description: The transit app isn’t screen-reader friendly.

scenarioCards.title: Voice Announcement Broken
scenarioCards.description: No audible next-stop updates.

scenarioCards.title: Smooth Connection
scenarioCards.description: You make a seamless transfer without delay.

scenarioCards.title: Late-Night Wait
scenarioCards.description: You wait 40 minutes at night alone.

scenarioCards.title: Street Performer
scenarioCards.description: Unexpected noise triggers anxiety.

scenarioCards.title: Polite Security
scenarioCards.description: Station staff help with directions.

scenarioCards.title: Fare Machine Down
scenarioCards.description: Unable to pay because the machine fails.

scenarioCards.title: Construction Noise
scenarioCards.description: Loud work disrupts your trip.

scenarioCards.title: Neighbor Shovels Snow
scenarioCards.description: Snow cleared early for safer walking.

scenarioCards.title: County Adds Tactile Warning Surface
scenarioCards.description: Tactile surface installed at crossing for accessibility.

scenarioCards.title: Pop‑Up Pedestrian Plaza on Main St.
scenarioCards.description: Street temporarily converted into a pedestrian plaza.

scenarioCards.title: Local Business Installs Ramp
scenarioCards.description: Ramp added to improve sidewalk access.

scenarioCards.title: State Sidewalk Grant Awarded
scenarioCards.description: Funding awarded to improve sidewalks.

scenarioCards.title: Bus Driver Helps Announce Stops
scenarioCards.description: Driver announces stops to aid navigation.

scenarioCards.title: Temporary Asphalt Side‑Path
scenarioCards.description: Grass path temporarily paved for easier walking.

scenarioCards.title: Community Walking Audit Complete
scenarioCards.description: Community audit identifies sidewalk improvements.

scenarioCards.title: Find-A-Ride Available
scenarioCards.description: Service helps plan trips to key destinations.

scenarioCards.title: Audio Beacon Installed
scenarioCards.description: Audible signals added at courthouse corner for guidance.

scenarioCards.title: Annual Art Walk
scenarioCards.description: Street closed to cars to encourage walking.

scenarioCards.title: New Bike Lane Painted
scenarioCards.description: Cyclists have a safer path along main roads.

scenarioCards.title: Community Garden Opens
scenarioCards.description: Neighborhood gains a pleasant walking destination.

scenarioCards.title: Street Light Upgraded
scenarioCards.description: Brighter lights improve nighttime safety.

scenarioCards.title: Bus Shelter Added
scenarioCards.description: Shelter provides comfort while waiting.

scenarioCards.title: Crosswalk Painted
scenarioCards.description: New crosswalk improves pedestrian safety.

scenarioCards.title: Neighborhood Clean-Up Day
scenarioCards.description: Cleaner streets make walking more pleasant.

scenarioCards.title: Speed Bumps Installed
scenarioCards.description: Slower traffic improves pedestrian safety.

scenarioCards.title: Public Art Mural Added
scenarioCards.description: Colorful mural makes walking routes more engaging.
